SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package com.brickbreakergame.managers

Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
com.brickbreakergame.managers.SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
Manages sound effects and background music for the Brick Breaker game. This class provides methods to play, stop, and control various sound effects and background music tracks. It supports playing different sound effects for game events like button clicks, collecting bonuses, and more. Background music can be started, stopped, and its volume can be controlled. Sound effects for specific game events are managed through individual methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundManager

      public SoundManager()

  • Method Details

    • startRandomBackgroundMusic

      public static void startRandomBackgroundMusic()
      Starts playing a random background music track from the available selection. If the music files list is empty, logs an error and takes no action. If music is already playing, it is stopped before starting a new track.

    • buttonClickSound

      public static void buttonClickSound()
      Plays a button click sound effect.

    • heartBonus

      public static void heartBonus()
      Plays a heart bonus sound effect.

    • paddleBounceSound

      public static void paddleBounceSound()
      Plays a paddle bounce sound effect.

    • pauseMenuMusic

      public static void pauseMenuMusic()
      Plays a pause menu music sound effect.

    • ballHitFloor

      public static void ballHitFloor()
      Plays a sound effect when the ball hits the floor.

    • levelUp

      public static void levelUp()
      Plays a sound effect when the player levels up.

    • gameOver

      public static void gameOver()
      Plays a game over sound effect.

    • winSound

      public static void winSound()
      Plays a win sound effect.

    • goldBallPowerUp

      public static void goldBallPowerUp()
      Plays a sound effect when the player collects a gold ball power-up.

    • muteSoundPauseMenu

      public static void muteSoundPauseMenu()
      Plays a sound effect to mute sound in the pause menu.

    • blockHit

      public static void blockHit()
      Plays a sound effect when a block is hit.

    • collectBonus

      public static void collectBonus()
      Plays a sound effect when the player collects a bonus. Sets the volume level for this specific sound effect before playing it.

    • soundMenu

      public static void soundMenu()
      Plays a sound effect for opening a menu and sets the volume for this specific sound.

    • startBackgroundMusic

      public static void startBackgroundMusic(String musicFilePath)
      Starts playing background music from the specified music file. Sets the initial volume and loops the music indefinitely. If an error occurs, logs an error message.
      Parameters:
      musicFilePath - The file path of the background music to start.

    • toggleMuteBackgroundMusic

      public static void toggleMuteBackgroundMusic()
      Toggles the mute state of the background music. Mutes the music if currently playing, or unmutes if currently muted.

    • setVolume

      public static void setVolume(double volume)
      Sets the volume level for the background music. Ensures that the volume is only adjusted if the background music player is not null.
      Parameters:
      volume - The volume level (0.0 to 1.0) to set.

    • getVolume

      public static double getVolume()
      Gets the current volume level of the background music. Returns 0 if the background music player is null.
      Returns:
      The current volume level (0.0 to 1.0).
